itemDisplayName: automation account with updating automation modules and runbook execution
description: This template provides an example of how to create an automation account and updating automation modules and then executing runbook that registers an application into active directory, in a single deployment
summary: Deploy an automation account and updates automation modules version from powershell gallery and executes runbook job that registers application in the active directory. Then appId and key can be updated in any application setting to manage azure resources easily.
